entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 03:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h gust 32 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
